name: Email Re-Validator; revalidation solution for Ultimate Member
author: iFixCodes.com

sections.description:
Email Re-Validator Plugin Summary

Your #1 wordpress solution to enable “user email re-validation” for the ultimate member plugin.

With added user email re-validation capability to the ultimate member plugin (“UM”), site owers and admins can now be confident that all user email addresses have been confirmed, verified and are without a doubt validated when a user chooses to change or update their account email address.

When a website user or member changes their account email, it will automatically sign out that user and send a verification email to the users newly updated email address to be confirmed. Users will be unable to sign into their account again until they have confirmed their new email address.

Plugin Features:

  • Automatically logs users out on email change or update
  • Redirects users to UM login url set by the admin
  • Verification email sent out to users new email address
  • Security locks user out until their email has been re-verified
  • Completely style and customize your email template in UM admin area
  • Preventive secure steps taken to prevent accidental activation if UM not installed
  • HTML supported notice will prompts user with instructions of the next step to take to verify their email address
  • Super easy and simple to setup
  • Developers can easily update message and code to suit each specific needs

Read about all of the plugin’s features at the official Email re-validator web page.
sections.installation:
Easy as 1-2-3

    1. Install the plugin through your “WordPress admin -> Plugins -> Add New” or by uploading the plugin to your wordpress plugins folder (“/wp-content/plugin/”).
    1. Activate the plugin in your “WordPress admin -> Plugins” menu
    1. Enable and edit your new template under your “WordPress admin -> UM -> Settings -> Email -> Email Re-Validator Template”.

IMPORTANT: Your “Email Re-Validator Template” MUST at minimum, include the “{account_activation_link}” placeholder/tag, otherwise your users cannot confirm their email and will be locked out.

  • See our templates for more examples: Email re-validator template examples

Congratulations! You’re all set and ready to go. Your website now has enhanced “user email re-validation” capabilities.
sections.faq:
Do I need to know any coding to use the Email Re-Validator plugin?

No, be sure ultimate member is installed and configured, then simply install and activate the plugin and you’re ready to go.

Will the plugin break my site?

No. We have not used any external javascript or css. All code is custom built around the built-in wordpress and the ultimate plugin classes and functions to reduce maximum interruptions.

Does the plugin work with any WordPress theme?

Yes. The only major requirement is the Ultimate Member plugin. If you pass the requirements and have ultimate member installed, it should work without a hitch.

Are you endorsed or affiliate with Ultimate Member

No. iFixCodes is currently not affiliated with Ultimate Member. We saw the need for a User Email verification, confirmation & re-validation for Ultimate Member, so we took the initiative to bring you just such a solution.

Do you provide support for Ultimate Member Plugin

No. The Ultimate Member Plugin and all of it’s contents, copyrights, registered trade marks and affilaites are the sole property of and owned by the Ultimate Member Group Ltd. For Ultimate Member support, visit the Ultimate Member Support Forum.

Notice of Non-Affiliation and Disclaimer

We are not affiliated, associated, authorized, endorsed by, or in any way officially connected with UM, or any of its subsidiaries or its affiliates. The official Ultimate Member Plugin website can be found at https://ultimatemember.com/
The name Ultimate Member as well as related names, marks, emblems and images are registered trademarks of their respective owners.

Documentation & Support

Got a problem or need additional help with our Email Re-Validator plugin for UM? Check out the plugin faq page.
If a solution cannot be found to your current related issue, we urge you to create a topic at the support forum.

screenshots.caption: The Email Re-Validator Plugin will install fine, however it will not activate if Ultimate Member in not installed and first activated.
After Email Re-Validator is installed and activated a new email template ("Email Re-Validator Template") item option will become available.
Clicking on the new email template will allow you to enable Email Re-Validator and also allow you to style your new email template.
After setting up your template, your users and members can log into your ultimate member website and change their email as desired within the account section.
The Email Re-Validator Plugin will fire up. Log the user out and send a confirmation email to the new email address.
